CartValidationOutput.name: CartValidationOutput
CartValidationOutput.description: Associate errors to cart entities, such as cart line items, delivery groups, and the like, in a store built with B2B Commerce or D2C Commerce. An example error is “Out of stock.”

BackgroundOperationId.description: ID of the background operation that ran the validation.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The ISO code for the currency that’s specified on the buyer’s account. Default value is USD.Possible values are:

IsDismissed.description: Indicates whether the validation process is finished. Default value is false.

Level.description: Describes the type of output resulting from the validation process. Possible values are: 0 (Info) 1 (Error) 2 (Warning)

Message.description: Defines the message to show in the log when validation is complete. Message can be up to 255 characters.

Name.description: The name of this CartValidationOutput record. Name can be up to 255 characters.

RelatedEntityId.description: Foreign key to WebCart, CartItem, and CartDeliveryGroup.

RelatedEntityPrefix.description: Three-character prefix for the related entity.

Type.description: The CartValidationOutput type. Possible values are: CartSave — Available in API version 64.0 and later. Entitlement Inventory Other Pricing Promotions Shipping ShippingPromotions SystemError Taxes
